originalText.text: Dr. Wegman is a compassionate, attentive pediatrician who is also an excellent clinician. She is knowledgeable and patient, personable and kind. She is great. My daughter loves her.

text.text: Dr. Wegman is a compassionate, attentive pediatrician who is also an excellent clinician. She is knowledgeable and patient, personable and kind. She is great. My daughter loves her.

originalText.text: Dr Wegman is an incredible pediatrician. She has been taking care of our first son for the last 3.5 years and now our newborn son. Our family always feels better after a visit with her. Her bedside manner and confidence in her care delivered are beyond reassuring. She is quick to respond to any questions and always provides a clear and precise plan. We love Dr Wegman and are very lucky to have her taking care of our boys.

text.text: Dr Wegman is an incredible pediatrician. She has been taking care of our first son for the last 3.5 years and now our newborn son. Our family always feels better after a visit with her. Her bedside manner and confidence in her care delivered are beyond reassuring. She is quick to respond to any questions and always provides a clear and precise plan. We love Dr Wegman and are very lucky to have her taking care of our boys.

originalText.text: Dr. Wegman is the most amazing pediatrician. Not only does my son absolutely adore her (which makes office visits easy!), but I don’t know what I would do without her walking me through every little thing that has come up.  She is knowledgeable and confident, and her bedside manner is so wonderful that my son asks to see “his doctor friend” even though she is the one who decides when he needs shots!  She has also supported my son and I through some harder times with grace and ease - she has been a rock. We almost went with a different pediatrician and I am so glad we met Dr. Wegman!

text.text: Dr. Wegman is the most amazing pediatrician. Not only does my son absolutely adore her (which makes office visits easy!), but I don’t know what I would do without her walking me through every little thing that has come up.  She is knowledgeable and confident, and her bedside manner is so wonderful that my son asks to see “his doctor friend” even though she is the one who decides when he needs shots!  She has also supported my son and I through some harder times with grace and ease - she has been a rock. We almost went with a different pediatrician and I am so glad we met Dr. Wegman!

originalText.text: Dr. Wegman is the most caring, loving and patient Doctor. My 5 year old begs to go and see her. In the 5 1/2 years I have been seeing her I have never felt rushed.  She takes her time with me and my girls, answering every question. With my first daughter she was by side as my 7 week old had to be hospitalized with an infection.  She spoke to every Doctor and Nurse on call and made sure I was fully informed of what was going on.  When we were in the hospital the head Doctor asked who my Pediatrician was and when I said her name his response was simply "she is one of our best".  My second daughter was hospitalized at 7 months and Dr Wegman was once again by my side, making sure she spoke to everyone in the ER and calming my nerves. The fact that I do not need to bribe my daughter to go to the Doctor and get her shots says is all! I loved her from the moment I met her.  She was the Doctor on call when I brought my newborn to Global Pediatrics and the second I met her I knew she was our Doctor.  I recommend her to every person I meet, she truly is the best!

originalText.text: Dr. Wegman is the most caring, compassionate and thoughtful doctor you could ever take your children to. As a first time mom, Dr. Wegman handled all of my inquiries with kindness and never made me feel crazy for worrying or asking a question. She has always been accessible to us and never made me feel any guilt for contacting her when we weren't in town or able to be seen. She has a very "go with the flow" attitude and never made me question my parenting choices. I feel so lucky and fortunate to have found her and I know I will never be able to properly thank her for her amazing care. We love you Dr. Wegman!
